channel.title: EXSideRSS on Rabble-rousing Rambling
channel.description: Recent content in EXSideRSS on Rabble-rousing Rambling

item.title: EX-SideRSS
item.description: After several months of keeping away from updating or changing my website, I broke the fast today. I found a wonderful plugin, sideRSS, which allows display of RSS feeds within a blog’s sidebar. As usual, I needed a specific functionality that was not supported the way I wanted it. I hacked it a little bit, renamed the plugin, and posted a custom version for download on my website. If you need to share Google Shared Items, on your blog, but hate to include javascript (like I do), then use this.
